cause.description:
We promise to use all the money to help James buy BEER!!!! BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER BEER
You see... because without BEER the world will end!!!
1. Help James buy BEER
2. BEER prices must be lowered!!!
3. BEER is a right!!! Fight for your rights!!!
cause.name: BEER fund for James
